name: 5.1 Policies for information security
reason_selection: To ensure continuing suitability, adequacy, effectiveness of management direction and support for information security in accordance with business, legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements.

name: 5.2 Information security roles and responsibilities
reason_selection: To establish a defined, approved and understood structure for the implementation, operation and management of information security within the organization.

name: 5.3 Segregation of duties
reason_selection: To reduce the risk of fraud, error and bypassing of information security controls.

name: 5.4 Management responsibilities
reason_selection: To ensure management understand their role in information security and undertake actions aiming to ensure all personnel are aware of and fulfil their information security responsibilities.

name: 5.5 Contact with authorities
reason_selection: To ensure appropriate flow of information takes place with respect to information security between the organization and relevant legal, regulatory and supervisory authorities.

name: 5.6 Contact with special interest groups
reason_selection: To ensure appropriate flow of information takes place with respect to information security.

name: 5.7 Threat intelligence
reason_selection: To provide awareness of the organization’s threat environment so that the appropriate mitigation actions can be taken.

name: 5.8 Information security in project management
reason_selection: To ensure information security risks related to projects and deliverables are effectively addressed in project management throughout the project life cycle.

name: 5.9 Inventory of information and other associated assets
reason_selection: To identify the organization’s information and other associated assets in order to preserve their information security and assign appropriate ownership.

name: 5.10 Acceptable use of information and other associated assets
reason_selection: To ensure information and other associated assets are appropriately protected, used and handled.

name: 5.11 Return of assets
reason_selection: To protect the organization’s assets as part of the process of changing or terminating employment, contract or agreement.

name: 5.12 Classification of information
reason_selection: To ensure identification and understanding of protection needs of information in accordance with its importance to the organization.

name: 5.13 Labeling of information
reason_selection: To facilitate the communication of classification of information and support automation of information processing and management.

name: 5.14 Information transfer
reason_selection: To maintain the security of information transferred within an organization and with any external interested party.

name: 5.15 Access control
reason_selection: To ensure authorized access and to prevent unauthorized access to information and other associated assets.

name: 5.16 Identity management
reason_selection: To allow for the unique identification of individuals and systems accessing the organization’s information and other associated assets and to enable appropriate assignment of access rights.

name: 5.17 Authentication information
reason_selection: To ensure proper entity authentication and prevent failures of authentication processes.

name: 5.18 Access rights
reason_selection: To ensure access to information and other associated assets is defined and authorized according to the business requirements.

name: 5.19 Information security in supplier relationships
reason_selection: To maintain an agreed level of information security in supplier relationships.

name: 5.20 Addressing information security within supplier agreements
reason_selection: To maintain an agreed level of information security in supplier relationships.

name: 5.21 Managing information security in the ICT supply chain
reason_selection: To maintain an agreed level of information security in supplier relationships.

name: 5.22 Monitoring, review and change management of supplier services
reason_selection: To maintain an agreed level of information security and service delivery in line with supplier agreements.

name: 5.23 Information security for use of cloud services
reason_selection: To specify and manage information security for the use of cloud services.

name: 5.24 Information security incident management planning and preparation
reason_selection: To ensure quick, effective, consistent and orderly response to information security incidents, including communication on information security events.

name: 5.25 Assessment and decision on information security events
reason_selection: To ensure effective categorization and prioritization of information security events.

name: 5.26 Response to information security incidents
reason_selection: To ensure efficient and effective response to information security incidents.

name: 5.27 Learning from information security incidents
reason_selection: To reduce the likelihood or consequences of future incidents.

name: 5.28 Collection of evidence
reason_selection: To ensure a consistent and effective management of evidence related to information security incidents for the purposes of disciplinary and legal actions.

name: 5.29 Information security during disruption
reason_selection: To protect information and other associated assets during disruption.

name: 5.30 ICT readiness for business continuity
reason_selection: To ensure the availability of the organization’s information and other associated assets during disruption.

name: 5.31 Legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements
reason_selection: To ensure compliance with legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements related to information security.

name: 5.32 Intellectual property rights
reason_selection: To ensure compliance with legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements related to intellectual property rights and use of proprietary products.

name: 5.33 Protection of records
reason_selection: To ensure compliance with legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements, as well as community or societal expectations related to the protection and availability of records.

name: 5.34 Privacy and protection of PII
reason_selection: To ensure compliance with legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements related to the information security aspects of the protection of PII.

name: 5.35 Independent review of information security
reason_selection: To ensure the continuing suitability, adequacy and effectiveness of the organization’s approach to managing information security.

name: 5.36 Compliance with policies, rules and standards for information security
reason_selection: To ensure that information security is implemented and operated in accordance with the organization’s information security policy, topic-specific policies, rules and standards.

name: 5.37 Documented operating procedures
reason_selection: To ensure the correct and secure operation of information processing facilities

name: 6.1 Screening
reason_selection: To ensure all personnel are eligible and suitable for the roles for which they are considered and remain eligible and suitable during their employment.

name: 6.2 Terms and conditions of employment
reason_selection: To ensure personnel understand their information security responsibilities for the roles for which they are considered.

name: 6.3 Information security awareness, education and training
reason_selection: To ensure personnel and relevant interested parties are aware of and fulfil their information security responsibilities.

name: 6.4 Disciplinary process
reason_selection: To ensure personnel and other relevant interested parties understand the consequences of information security policy violation, to deter and appropriately deal with personnel and other relevant interested parties who committed the violation.

name: 6.5 Responsibilities after termination or change of employment
reason_selection: To protect the organization’s interests as part of the process of changing or terminating employment or contracts.

name: 6.6 Confidentiality or non-disclosure agreements
reason_selection: To maintain confidentiality of information accessible by personnel or external parties.

name: 6.7 Remote working
reason_selection: To ensure the security of information when personnel are working remotely.

name: 6.8 Information security event reporting
reason_selection: To support timely, consistent and effective reporting of information security events that can be identified by personnel.

name: 7.1 Physical security perimeters
reason_selection: To prevent unauthorized physical access, damage and interference to the organization’s information and other associated assets.

name: 7.2 Physical entry
reason_selection: To ensure only authorized physical access to the organization’s information and other associated assets occurs.

name: 7.3 Securing offices, rooms and facilities
reason_selection: To prevent unauthorized physical access, damage and interference to the organization’s information and other associated assets in offices, rooms and facilities.

name: 7.4 Physical security monitoring
reason_selection: To detect and deter unauthorized physical access.

name: 7.5 Protecting against physical and environmental threats
reason_selection: To prevent or reduce the consequences of events originating from physical and environmental threats.

name: 7.6 Working in secure areas
reason_selection: To protect information and other associated assets in secure areas from damage and unauthorized interference by personnel working in these areas.

name: 7.7 Clear desk and clear screen
reason_selection: To reduce the risks of unauthorized access, loss of and damage to information on desks, screens and in other accessible locations during and outside normal working hours.

name: 7.8 Equipment siting and protection
reason_selection: To reduce the risks from physical and environmental threats, and from unauthorized access and damage.

name: 7.9 Security of assets off-premises
reason_selection: To prevent loss, damage, theft or compromise of off-site devices and interruption to the organization’s operations.

name: 7.10 Storage media
reason_selection: To ensure only authorized disclosure, modification, removal or destruction of information on storage media.

name: 7.11 Supporting utilities
reason_selection: To prevent loss, damage or compromise of information and other associated assets, or interruption to the organization’s operations due to failure and disruption of supporting utilities.

name: 7.12 Cabling security
reason_selection: To prevent loss, damage, theft or compromise of information and other associated assets and interruption to the organization’s operations related to power and communications cabling.

name: 7.13 Equipment maintenance
reason_selection: To prevent loss, damage, theft or compromise of information and other associated assets and interruption to the organization’s operations caused by lack of maintenance.

name: 7.14 Secure disposal or re-use of equipment
reason_selection: To prevent leakage of information from equipment to be disposed or re-used.

name: 8.1 User endpoint devices
reason_selection: To protect information against the risks introduced by using user endpoint devices.

name: 8.2 Privileged access rights
reason_selection: To ensure only authorized users, software components and services are provided with privileged access rights.

name: 8.3 Information access restriction
reason_selection: To ensure only authorized access and to prevent unauthorized access to information and other associated assets.

name: 8.4 Access to source code
reason_selection: To prevent the introduction of unauthorized functionality, avoid unintentional or malicious changes and to maintain the confidentiality of valuable intellectual property.

name: 8.5 Secure authentication
reason_selection: To ensure a user or an entity is securely authenticated, when access to systems, applications and services is granted.

name: 8.6 Capacity management
reason_selection: To ensure the required capacity of information processing facilities, human resources, offices and other facilities.

name: 8.7 Protection against malware
reason_selection: To ensure information and other associated assets are protected against malware.

name: 8.8 Management of technical vulnerabilities
reason_selection: To prevent exploitation of technical vulnerabilities.

name: 8.9 Configuration management
reason_selection: To ensure hardware, software, services and networks function correctly with required security settings, and configuration is not altered by unauthorized or incorrect changes.

name: 8.10 Information deletion
reason_selection: To prevent unnecessary exposure of sensitive information and to comply with legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements for information deletion.

name: 8.11 Data masking
reason_selection: To limit the exposure of sensitive data including PII, and to comply with legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements.

name: 8.12 Data leakage prevention
reason_selection: To detect and prevent the unauthorized disclosure and extraction of information by individuals or systems.

name: 8.13 Information backup
reason_selection: To enable recovery from loss of data or systems.

name: 8.14 Redundancy of information processing facilities
reason_selection: To ensure the continuous operation of information processing facilities.

name: 8.15 Logging
reason_selection: To record events, generate evidence, ensure the integrity of log information, prevent against unauthorized access, identify information security events that can lead to an information security incident and to support investigations.

name: 8.16 Monitoring activities
reason_selection: To detect anomalous behaviour and potential information security incidents.

name: 8.17 Clock synchronization
reason_selection: To enable the correlation and analysis of security-related events and other recorded data, and to support investigations into information security incidents.

name: 8.18 Use of privileged utility programs
reason_selection: To ensure the use of utility programs does not harm system and application controls for information security.

name: 8.19 Installation of software on operational systems
reason_selection: To ensure the integrity of operational systems and prevent exploitation of technical vulnerabilities.

name: 8.20 Networks security
reason_selection: To protect information in networks and its supporting information processing facilities from compromise via the network.

name: 8.21 Security of network services
reason_selection: To ensure security in the use of network services.

name: 8.22 Segregation of networks
reason_selection: To split the network in security boundaries and to control traffic between them based on business needs.

name: 8.23 Web filtering
reason_selection: To protect systems from being compromised by malware and to prevent access to unauthorized web resources.

name: 8.24 Use of cryptography
reason_selection: To ensure proper and effective use of cryptography to protect the confidentiality, authenticity or integrity of information according to business and information security requirements, and taking into consideration legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements related to cryptography.

name: 8.25 Secure development life cycle
reason_selection: To ensure information security is designed and implemented within the secure development life cycle of software and systems.

name: 8.26 Application security requirements
reason_selection: To ensure all information security requirements are identified and addressed when developing or acquiring applications.

name: 8.27 Secure system architecture and engineering principles
reason_selection: To ensure information systems are securely designed, implemented and operated within the development life cycle.

name: 8.28 Secure coding
reason_selection: To ensure software is written securely thereby reducing the number of potential information security vulnerabilities in the software.

name: 8.29 Security testing in development and acceptance
reason_selection: To validate if information security requirements are met when applications or code are deployed to the production environment.

name: 8.30 Outsourced development
reason_selection: To ensure information security measures required by the organization are implemented in outsourced system development.

name: 8.31 Separation of development, test and production environments
reason_selection: To protect the production environment and data from compromise by development and test activities.

name: 8.32 Change management
reason_selection: To preserve information security when executing changes.

name: 8.33 Test information
reason_selection: To ensure relevance of testing and protection of operational information used for testing.

name: 8.34 Protection of information systems during audit testing
reason_selection: To minimize the impact of audit and other assurance activities on operational systems and business processes.
